column13: Since 2020, Computershare has invested in mitigation beyond our value chain by supporting a socially responsible forest protection project in East Tambopata Province, located in the southeastern part of the Madre de Dios region in Peru. The project is dedicated to conserving the Amazon rainforest and is classified as a forest ecosystem restoration project focused on emissions reduction. Examples of project activities are the geographical marking of the project area sections, training on Brazil nut harvesting and the provision of tools.
column20: Beyond Value Chain, Amazon rainforest, geographical marking
